name: PayLane
description: PayLane.com is an online payments provider that offers accepting payments in 160 currencies from around the world. Besides the most popular payments methods, such as credit and debit cards, wire transfers or PayPal, PayLane also offers solutions characteristic for specific European markets. Thanks to plugins for ecommerce platforms, descriptors, single-click and recurring payments, PayLane is more than just accepting payments – it’s a way to boost your business internationally. PayLane’s offering is directed both at the biggest international companies and new businesses – having once been a startup themselves, PayLane supports even the smallest companies by enabling them to accept payments.
